Html:
Hi everyone,

I need to play a sound in windows XP, can someone tell me how I can do this? I have try the wasapi code, but it doesn't work.

Thanks in advance for any help

I do it with waveout.

You need to create wavestream or/and wave provider and init your waveout with the provider.

Hi Mayakz23,

Thank you for your reply. Could you please provide me any example? Thanks

Please look on the Documentation tab for examples about how to use NAudio

Mark
